Hey Violet discography
Hey Violet in January 2016
Studio albums 2
Music videos 9
EPs 3
Singles 9

American rock band Hey Violet has released two studio albums, three extended plays, nine singles, and nine music videos.

  • 2 Extended plays

  • 4 Music videos

Notes[edit]

  1. ^ "Brand New Moves" did not enter the Billboard Hot 100, but peaked at number one on the Hot Singles Sales chart.[15]
